title: 游戏一进入就莫名其妙的崩溃
author: AppleCarrot
txt_content:
1.14.4 游戏一登陆莫名其妙崩溃了[启动器:HMCL]
崩溃报告
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Hi. I'm Minecraft, and I'm a crashaholic.

replies.author: Jeansou
replies.txt_content:
森林蝙蝠 发表于 2019-8-17 22:00
你再重启一下？
java.nio.file.AccessDeniedException拒绝访问
F:\MC\MC\.minecraft\versions\1.14.4\saves是不是设了只读
